entry.title: [GRA2][Network] - Network equipment operation - Rack G209A10
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 19, 23:30 UTC  -  Jul 20, 00:00 UTC

Jun 30, 22:28 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/07/2023 23:30 UTC
End time : 20/07/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : You may observed some loss of connectivity on public network for hosts behind this switch during the operation.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on a network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX7][DedicatedServers] - R710A01
entry.content:
Jun 30, 05:54 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 30/06/2023 04:35 UTC
End Time : 30/06/2023 05:52 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 30, 04:45 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 30, 04:41 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 30/06/2023 04:35 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack R710A01 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [CA/APAC][DedicatedServer] - Server certificate at delivery
entry.content:
Jun 29, 14:07 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 20/06/2023 10:00 UTC
End Time : 29/06/2023 13:58 UTC
Root cause :There was an issue with the system generating the PDF
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 28, 13:41 UTC
Update - Further investigation reported the same situation on CA and APAC zones.
We continue to work on the issue.

Jun 28, 12:56 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 20/06/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Server certificate is not generated for servers in Mumbai when delivering a server
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.content:

End Time : 29/06/2023 10:27 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 29, 11:19 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 29/06/2023 10:18 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack 22D10 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [SYD/SGP][Delivery] - APAC
entry.content:
Jun 28, 13:23 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 28, 08:04 UTC
Update - Start time : 27/06/2023 07:08 UTC
End time : 28/06/2023 07:53 UTC
Service status : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause: It was due to a malfunction on a robot migration

Jun 28, 07:42 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 28, 07:41 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 27/06/2023 07:08 UTC
Service impact : Lifecycle of APAC servers are unreachable (delivery/suspension/deletion)
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
